title: Petition to change the joke to "nerf Sona"
body: Title. More nerfs incoming for her.

replies.body:
Who's Irelia?
No clue, so we'd better nerf Sona!
sona has too much boobage and we were getting to many feminazi complaints, so to compensate we nerfed her.
Not! They already nerfed her boobies a bit ago. These were after the booby nerf.
I see lee sin is still a problem, better nerf sona
I see the support lane is being dominated by Thresh, Leona, Janna, Braum, and Morg. Better nerf Sona.
I see graves every match, and watch him down a squishy with 2 aa's and ult better nerf sona

Riot's balance team just keeps getting better and better!
-.-
I accidentally grabbed a mana pot as zed, better nerf sona.
People are actually picking her? Better nerf Sona.
Lee Sin is an assassin,mage,tank,bruiser,support,ADC,DPS,mobile OP champ?Better nerf Sona.
Somehow I got the feeling she'll be nerfed to the ground and then buffed when she gets that ulti skin... and after people have bought it, nerf her again.

She is already nerfed to the point of not being played...and then nerfed again lol. But yes, Rito will buff her for the skin I think. Because all they care about is money. That is why Lee and others will never be touched, despite being strong forever and ever and ever (taylor swift voice).
